meanings.sent1: She enjoys expositing complex ideas in a simple way.
meanings.sent2: The teacher is expositing the lesson to the students.
meanings.sent3: He was expositing the rules of the game with funny gestures.
meanings.sent4: Her storytelling expositing the history of the town was captivating.
meanings.sent5: The magician's expositing of his tricks left the audience in awe.

meanings.definition: To present or set forth in detail
meanings.sent1: The author is expositing his new book at the book fair.
meanings.sent2: The architect is expositing the building plans to the clients.
meanings.sent3: The chef was expositing the recipe with colorful illustrations.
meanings.sent4: The artist's painting expositing the beauty of nature was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The scientist's experiment expositing the theory was groundbreaking.
